name: Robot Magic
description:
Inspired by Final Fantasy Legend II / SaGa II: Hihou Densetsu originally released for the Nintendo Gameboy:

  • Final Fantasy Legend II Museum
  • Final Fantasy Legend II wikipedia entry

This prototype was crated without the use of a commercial game engine as a submission for the RpgMania II game jam. Featuring turn-based battles, equippable weapons and items, randomly generated and respawning treasure chest contents, and basic character progression with random stat gains at the end of battles. Recruit or craft some party members and increase your stats with equippable items and or participation in battle.

Controls
  • Arrow Keys: Move player character, select menu option
  • Enter / Spacebar: Interact, confirm menu option
  • Escape: Open main menu, return to previous menu
  • Shift: Hold to enable running mode
